director.name: 巴拉克·古德曼 Barak Goodman

this_title: Woodstock: Three Days That Defined a Generation
trans_title: 伍德斯托克：定义一代人的三天
introduction: 整理链接:https://www.7bt.org/?thread-1789.htmIn August 1969| 500|000 people gathered at a farm in upstate New York. What happened there was far more than just a concert. Woodstock tells the story of a legendary event that defined a generation through the voices of those who were there.
chinese_title: 伍德斯托克：定义一代人的三天
foreign_title: Woodstock: Three Days That Defined a Generation
